title: Workout & Calories Burned Calculator (MET + HR Zones) – CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Calories per minute: \\( \\text{kcal/min} = \\dfrac{\\text{MET} \\times 3.5 \\times \\text{weight (kg)}}{200} \\) Total calories: \\( \\text{kcal} = \\text{kcal/min} \\times \\text{minutes} \\) Karvonen target heart rate: \\( HR_{target} = HR_{rest} + i \\times (HR_{max}-HR_{rest}) \\)
